lines.text: It seems to react badly to narcotics.
Nukie, I am prisoner of America!
How do you like my shirt?
I'm tired of this planet; nobody talks, nobody listens - I wish the earth would swallow me up!
And when they die they go to the stars, and then Sangoma talks to them.
I am from the stars. I haven't seen Sangoma or ancestors there - he must be mistaken!
He seems to be in a coma.
He? So far we don't know if this thing is animal, vegetable, or mineral.
And now my little ones, let me show you how children discover sleep on Foto Seven, where I come from.
The specimen shows interesting and strong reactions. Dr. Rhinestone reports signals showing similarity to pain reactions.
